review.comment:
Ready to go to work for you. Quick fast and in a hurray !

Three Cheers And A Standing Ovation !

We had a roofer stop by and inspect our roof after a storm.  They said we had damage from the storm and offered to file a claim on our behalf. Unbeknownst to us, they mistakenly gave 2 separate dates of loss (one was outside of the policy period) to the claims department, so our insurance company used that as an excuse to deny the entire claim.  Voss law firm battled the insurance company for 2 years on our behalf. Although their portion of the recovery was more than we ended up receiving, we have no doubt the insurance company would have never paid us a dime without Voss. They were tenacious, professional and thoroughly explained everything so we knew what to expect.
So far they are serving me fine.

The Voss Law Firm represents it's clients in an ethical and professional manner with positive results.  I am very satisfied with the hard work and results provided by Bryan Beverly and  Erika Blankenship.  They quickly responded to all of my emails and telephone calls and answered questions in an easy to understand fashion.

I used Voss Law Firm on a case that took 7 years to resolve.  We won the case.  I attempted to contact the attorneys on that case and they have all left the firm.  I received a response from Bill Voss's secretary and she stated she would get the information to him.  Two weeks go by and I have to contact her again to find out the status. She came up with a BS lie about Voss being out of the office.  She said she would notify me that same day  but did not. I contacted her again 8 days later and then I am being told she was out of the office for family emergency.  Again, I call BS!  If this is the way they treat previous customers, how would they treat a new customer????  Stay Clear of This Company!!!!
Response:
1st of all I was never told you do not handle Oil and Gas contracts.  Why in the world would I get mad about that?  Doesn't even make sense. Second, you never gave me alternatives due to the fact you never informed me of your lack of experience in this area.
Third, I never called anyone fat? Another falsehood.  That is just a ignorant statement.  Whoever wrote this response to my truthful opinions needs to be concerned about their salvation and not some fake lump of coal.  To finalize this review, I was extremely pleased with the attorneys working for your company 7 years ago.  They did an amazing job.  Unfortunately, none of them are still employed by your company.  Leads one to ponder why????
review.review_reply: Mr. Wuensche, I am very sorry you felt it was appropriate to leave a one-star review.  I would like to use this opportunity to clarify a few points you mention.  Number one - you say we "won your case" - isn't this a positive thing?  I'm sorry it took so long, but be glad you had lawyers that stayed in the fight with you long enough to see a positive outcome - many lawyers would have left you holding the bag once they realized your case wouldn't turn them a profit..we stayed by you the entire way fighting for you - just as we promised when you hired us.  Second, we must not be that bad of people - right?  You came to us to hire us for a subsequent matter, and it was only when we politely told you that we do not handle oil and gas cases that you decided to leave your bad review...we even offered to help you find a specialized lawyer in the field of oil and gas - which you rejected by sending us a nasty email saying we were fat...so mean Mr. Wuensche...Merry Christmas sir - I hope Santa brings you more than a lump of coal this season.

review.comment:
Wow what a quick response.
I needed help immediately and they just didn’t hesitate and helped me straight away.
So glad I found you guys.
Absolutely reasonable prices and extremely professional.
Thanks for making it so easy!!!
By Far- Number 1 in the area..!

(Translated by Google) We have had two cases with Voss attorneys. Very good results and always available to advise us.

(Original)
Hemos tenido dos casos con los abogados Voss. Muy buenos resultados y siempre disponibles para asesorarnos.

I have worked with the Voss Law Firm several times during the past few years and have never been disappointed with their expertise, their professionalism, and their staff. They are first rate when it comes to doing what it takes to achieve justice and fair treatment for their clients.

(Translated by Google) My insurance did not want to pay for the damages to my house. The attorneys helped me get insurance to pay for a new fence and a new roof.

(Original)
Mi seguro no queria pagar los danos de mi casa. Los abogados me ayudaron a que el seguro pagara por una cerca nueva y techo nuevo.

(Translated by Google) They answered all the questions and steered me in the right direction to resolve my case.

(Original)
Respondieron todas las preguntas y me guiaron en la dirección correcta para poder resolver mi caso.

(Translated by Google) They were able to get enough money to repair my house. Very good lawyers.

(Original)
Ellos pudieron conseguir suficiente dinero para reparar mi casa. Muy buenos abogados.

(Translated by Google) They were always aware of my case. Satisfied with the results!

(Original)
Siempre estuvieron al pendiente de mi caso. Satisfecha con los resultados!

I called The Voss Law Firm from online and immediately I was transferred to Todd who allowed me to explain my situation.  He took down my information and said that he would call me back after speaking with an attorney.  Todd called me back after 5 minutes with Dan on the line who proceeded to ask me questions and explained what I should do.  I'm not in the same state and though they can't be my lawyer they spent so much time with me and told me what I needed which was an "Injunction" against the party causing me damages.  I knew what I needed to do and I cannot thank Todd and Dan enough for helping me.  The best is that they want to know how things turn out, I will be texting them the results.  I can only say if you need a competent law firm who listens to you and gets things done - go with The Voss Law Firm.  I highly recommend, they truly care even if you are not one of their clients!

I feel so fortunate and grateful to have The Voss Law Firm defend our claims and obtain the settlements from an insurance company due to  storm and hail damage for three different properties. Voss staff is very professional, helpful and a pleasure to work with. Also,  a big personal THANK YOU to Julie Castillo for helping us recover unclaimed funds from the Texas Comptroller Office. Thank you, Julie! Thank you, The Voss Law Firm!

(Translated by Google) The Voss team answered and clarified my questions before we signed a contract with them. At no time do we feel pressured or forced to sign any document.

(Original)
El equipo de Voss respondio y clarifico mis preguntas antes de que firmaramos contrato con ellos. En ningun momento nos sentimos precionados ni forzados a firmar ningun documento.

(Translated by Google) The Voss Law Firm helped me with the claim we had with State Farm. They got us paid for all the damage to our house. Always having someone who can communicate in Spanish !!

(Original)
The Voss Law Firm me ayudo con el reclamo que teniamos con State Farm. Consiguieron que nos pagaran todos los danos que tenia nuestra casa. Siempre teniendo alguien que se comunicara en Español!!
After my husband and I were denied thousands of dollars by our Insurance company after Hurricane Harvey, Dan Simonds and his team were able to set everything right again.  Highly recommend them!

(Translated by Google) Very good service. They were very kind and patient with all my questions and concerns. They helped me a lot when we were inundated with Harvey. I'm very grateful. I recommend it!

(Original)
Muy bien servicio. Fueron muy amables y pacientes con todas mis preguntas y preocupaciones. Ellos me ayudaron mucho cuando nos inundamos de Harvey. Estoy muy agradecida. Se los recomiendo!

(Translated by Google) I am extremely satisfied with the service everyone at The Voss Law Firm has provided me. All the staff have been very friendly, professional, and efficient in helping me with my case. I definitely recommend them!

(Original)
Estoy extremadamente satisfecha con el servicio que me han brindado todos en The Voss Law Firm. Todo el personal ha sido muy amable, profesional y eficaz en ayudarme con mi caso. Definitivamente los recomiendo!

(Translated by Google) Excellent quality of customer service. The whole team has been very sensitive to my questions and attentive to my doubts in a fast way. I fully recommend them!

(Original)
Excelente calidad de servicio al cliente. Todo el equipo ha sido muy sensible a mis preguntas y atentos a mis dudas en una manera rápida. Los recomiendo completamente!
Bryan Beverly handled my case with white gloves. He is the best!
The Voss Law team provided an excellent service. They assisted me in processing my claim efficiently. Great service. Thank you so much.

They are the most responsive law firm I've ever talked to online and they make claiming insurance very easy.  I asked them to help me get fair compensation for the losses that concurred to my store during lockdown and I was able to get benefits.
very professional team, handled my claim quickly and made sure I understood the process every step of the way. Highly recommend :)
Extremely helpful just by a simple phone call. Highly recommend!
I highly respect and recommend them.
Lawyers that are on your side
The Voss law firm helpehelped me out of a dire situation.  I run a daycare out of my home and Vince helped me get a new roof.

I was very satisfied  with Vince Santini with the Voss Law Firm. He  worked really hard and very consistent. Vince made me feel comfortable while talking to him. He settled my case and I highly  recommend him to anybody. This is a good company.

Voss Law Firm has been a go-to resource for years now. Each of the clients I have had the pleasure of referring over have had successful outcomes. Even when things appear to be going the wrong way,  Voss attorneys have never let up and have pushed through to be victorious. I have referred large commercial clients as well as a quasi-State of Texas agency. Bill and his team are valiant warriors in the courtroom and I have not hesitated in referring friends and clients dealing with complicated insurance matters to them- every time!
Best law firm in Texas
I am very pleased and satisfied with the quality of the service provided. My case should not have been solved without the responsive and professional help from Mr. Voss. Would highly recommend!!!

By far the most intelligent, experienced, and capable law firm I've ever used. The team at Voss law firm helped my company navigate 4 different complicated insurance law suits over the past 4 years and every single one of them ended in with the other side choosing to settle and for more money than was initially offered. I WOULD and have recommended the team at Voss to anyone involved in any sort of insurance related litigation. They really do care and they really do go the extra mile

I would really like to appreciate the services offered at The Voss Law Firm, PC. The whole team of the firm is very professional and they exactly delivered what they promised. Thank you, Mr. Voss, Scott and everyone at The Voss law- for being there for me on my behalf.

I have been using the services of Mr.Bill as my Insurance claim attorney for the past 4 years. He's professional and efficient. He helped me solve several delicate issues, I have recommended them to my family and my friends and I really recommend them to anybody who's looking for an Insurance lawyer.

I certainly will have The Voss Law Firm in my mind when a similar need occurs whether it be us, family members, friends or acquaintances. I had given up on my case and Mr. Bill Voss made it possible! I am very happy with the services. I would really like to Thank Voss Law Firm for helping me get through this.

The group at The Voss Law Firm, PC truly went above and beyond in handling my Insurance claim. They diligently explained to me every situation in detail and answered all of my questions. I had the pleasure of dealing with Mr. Bill Voss, who, from the very start, was upfront and realistic regarding my situation and expectations. In the end The Voss Law Firm, PC maximised my claim--for which I am very grateful. I was very fortunate to fall into the care of the Voss Law Firm, PC, and I would recommend them to anyone in need of a law firm to handle a Insurance Claim matter.
Mr Bill Voss is the type of lawyer that you should want to keep on speed dial. He is very efficient and gets the job done promptly. I would recommend him to friends and family.

I wanted to say that Mr.Voss has done an excellent job. I am extremely satisfied with the work and care that Mr.Voss and his team provided. He is really smart, pleasant, knowledgeable and professional. I would recommend him to others without hesitation.

Straight to the point and very professional… these are the words I would use to describe Mr.Voss and his legal team. A friend of mine recommended me Mr.Voss's office. I consider myself to be a very detail oriented person, sometimes pushing the boundaries on the patience of the person providing the details. I was very relieved and pleased when I found that Mr.voss was not only very knowledgeable in his field but he also welcomed any and all queries I had in my mind.
I could not be happier with the services I received from Mr.Voss. He is extremely efficient and professional and also he was responsive to my phone calls and emails and always available to answer questions.

Scott is a man of his word and very intelligent.  Scott and his team was beyond supportive through the tough time in my lives. They answered every single question that I had. I am so grateful that I chose them for my case. Thank you so much.

Bill Voss has provided legal advice and guidance during my difficult situation.  I will never use another attorney again, Bill is trustworthy, honest and knowledgeable. Truly one of a kind.
I would highly recommend Bill to anyone who needs help with the claim.Should the situation arise, I would not hesitate to seek representation from Bill Voss again.

I would highly recommend Mr. Voss. My experience with him was amazing. We have been working with Mr. Voss and his team for a long time. The Voss Law Firm LC helped us stay within our very tight startup budget. The VLF team will be our go-to legal team, so save your time and energy; you have already found the team that you were looking for.
Mr. Voss is such a professional and so easy to work with! He answered all of my questions and I was extremely satisfied with the services they provided for me.

i would like to take this opportunity to recommend The Voss Law Firm.  They demonstrated tremendous expertise in dealing with my insurance case.  I feel they had a firm grasp on what it took to settle my case.  I was kept informed during the procedure and the were available to answer my questions.
Great, friendly professionals who are ready to listen and help.
